item.description:
MOVIE AND CHINESE FOOD
TC: David at: DGoldsmith38@aol.com (978) 740-0345 before 9:30

EVENT: What else do Jews do on Christmas besides go out to the movies and for Chinese food?

MEET: 5 PM for dinner at the Royal East 792 Main st, Cambridge MA and figure movie to start around 7pm at the Kendall Square Cinema, One Kendall Sq.

RSVP: Mandatory by December 20. Exact movie and time will not be determined until movie schedule has been published, and RSVPers have made known their preferences.

COST: Cost of dinner plus movie entrance fee. $5 for non-members.
Look up Royal East at: http://cambridge.zami...

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Movie and Chinese Food
